extendedInfo.description: Fun video editing app for making short movies.  Reverse / Rewind and fast forward to a beat using a "jiggle" control, frame by frame, forward and back.Make funny movies to share with friends.   Dance, flips, jumps and funny faces!Let your fingers groove and make your friends move! * "Jiggle" control for controlling video speed and direction, frame by frame, forward and backwards.* Add sound tracks from your device's music library.* Edit existing videos or record new ones.* Really easy to use.* Full HD output for top quality movies.* Uses built in hardware decoder / encoder for performance.Dance moves and aerobatic feats are easy!Demo of jiggle movie in action : http://youtu.be/ZivYtdi2PUwIf you have any problems or questions please contact jigglemovie@broadgun.com

reviews.comment: What a fantastic app! I\'ve got the kids at my school using out to create short media projects. Super fun and easy to use!
reviews.author: Suzi Broadbear

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Made me lol when I searched jiggle to give it five stars
reviews.author: Bennett A. Meares

reviews.title: No more boring videos
reviews.comment: Makes your videos fun to share and so easy to use.
reviews.author: Rosemary Rees

reviews.title: Messed up the quality of video.
reviews.comment: It took forever to make and then after waiting for 30mins the vid was made into a wide screen view and it was so stretched it looked too awful.
reviews.author: glenda secret

reviews.comment: Gotta love an app that makes you lol!
reviews.author: Kerryn Chewe
